name: Prerna
body:
### welcome
This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance. Homework sets, papers I've authored,  Python programs, and blog posts are all fair game.

### My python notebooks
* [Python Basics](https://github.com/prerna09/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-basics-notebook.ipynb)

### Python in Finance
We use Python in some of our classes, and here is some of my work:
* [Basics notebook]
* [Secret notebook]

### Papers
* [Paper 1]
* [Paper 2]

### About me
I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, in the Quantitative Finance and Risk Management (https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I did my undergraduate work in Applied Mathematics at Georgia Institute of Technology. My hobbies are watching movies and reading.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
